routing.decisionengine

Class SnFDecisionEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • routing.decisionengine.SnFDecisionEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoutingDecisionEngine

    public class SnFDecisionEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements RoutingDecisionEngine
    An implementation of the Spray and Focus Routing protocol using the Decision Engine framework.

        public void connectionUp(DTNHost thisHost,
                         DTNHost peer)
        Description copied from interface: RoutingDecisionEngine

        Specified by:
        connectionUp in interface RoutingDecisionEngine

      • doExchangeForNewConnection

        public void doExchangeForNewConnection(Connection con,
                                       DTNHost peer)
        Description copied from interface: RoutingDecisionEngine
        Called once for each connection that comes up to give two decision engine objects on either end of the connection to exchange and update information in a simultaneous fashion. This call is provided so that one end of the connection does not perform an update based on newly updated information from the opposite end of the connection (real life would reflect an update based on the old peer information).
        Specified by:
        doExchangeForNewConnection in interface RoutingDecisionEngine

      • isFinalDest

        public boolean isFinalDest(Message m,
                           DTNHost aHost)
        Description copied from interface: RoutingDecisionEngine
        Determines if the given host is an intended recipient of the given Message. This method is expected to be called when a new Message is received at a given router.
        Specified by:
        isFinalDest in interface RoutingDecisionEngine
        Parameters:
        m - Message just received
        aHost - Host to check
        Returns:
        true if the given host is a recipient of this given message. False otherwise.

      • newMessage

        public boolean newMessage(Message m)
        Description copied from interface: RoutingDecisionEngine
        Allows the decision engine to gather information from the given message and determine if it should be forwarded on or discarded. This method is only called when a message originates at the current host (not when received from a peer). In this way, applications can use a Message to communicate information to this routing layer.
        Specified by:
        newMessage in interface RoutingDecisionEngine
        Parameters:
        m - the new Message to consider routing
        Returns:
        True if the message should be forwarded on. False if the message should be discarded.

      • shouldDeleteOldMessage

        public boolean shouldDeleteOldMessage(Message m,
                                      DTNHost hostReportingOld)
        Description copied from interface: RoutingDecisionEngine
        Called if an attempt was unsuccessfully made to transfer a message to a peer and the return code indicates the message is old or already delivered, in which case it might be appropriate to delete the message.
        Specified by:
        shouldDeleteOldMessage in interface RoutingDecisionEngine
        Parameters:
        m - Old Message
        hostReportingOld - Peer claiming the message is old
        Returns:
        true if the message should be deleted. False otherwise.

      • shouldDeleteSentMessage

        public boolean shouldDeleteSentMessage(Message m,
                                       DTNHost otherHost)
        Description copied from interface: RoutingDecisionEngine
        Called after a message is sent to some other peer to ask if it should now be deleted from the message store.
        Specified by:
        shouldDeleteSentMessage in interface RoutingDecisionEngine
        Parameters:
        m - Sent message
        otherHost - Host who received the message
        Returns:
        true if the message should be deleted. False otherwise.

      • shouldSaveReceivedMessage

        public boolean shouldSaveReceivedMessage(Message m,
                                         DTNHost thisHost)
        Description copied from interface: RoutingDecisionEngine
        Called to determine if a new message received from a peer should be saved to the host's message store and further forwarded on.
        Specified by:
        shouldSaveReceivedMessage in interface RoutingDecisionEngine
        Parameters:
        m - Message just received
        thisHost - The requesting host
        Returns:
        true if the message should be saved and further routed. False otherwise.

      • shouldSendMessageToHost

        public boolean shouldSendMessageToHost(Message m,
                                       DTNHost otherHost)
        Description copied from interface: RoutingDecisionEngine
        Called to determine if the given Message should be sent to the given host. This method will often be called multiple times in succession as the DecisionEngineRouter loops through its respective Message or Connection Collections.
        Specified by:
        shouldSendMessageToHost in interface RoutingDecisionEngine
        Parameters:
        m - Message to possibly sent
        otherHost - peer to potentially send the message to.
        Returns:
        true if the message should be sent. False otherwise.
